This is consistent. Every day the numbers keep rising. These numbers alone are from assholes on Easter. Next wk itll be assholes because if your reopening. BUT WE KNOW YOU WONT BE LEAVING THE HOUSE YET. Your gonna kill alot of us. And you dont care.
